documents.document: What a birthday! Would have been nice take the win but happy with 4th in final stage and KOM jersey at… https://t.co/7ncyXXh86Q
It's my birthday! Traditionally my worst stage of the @HeraldSunTour but hoping to change that and keep this KOM je… https://t.co/4QQ7AArQ9e
Finished 6th in the bunch sprint today at @HeraldSunTour and held onto the KOM jersey. Big final stage tomorrow at… https://t.co/MlBKp4BbAF
A flat tyre ended my day on the last KOM but I was able to pick up the first one and now lead the KOM classificatio… https://t.co/uRgBr9lKiW
It's Dad's birthday. He loves watching bike racing, so I entered @HeraldSunTour & arranged @CyclingCentral live stream. Happy birthday Dad!
Last day of @ATGCycling training camp at Falls Creek with this great group of guys before we start the… https://t.co/pxlB6Xoq9i
Boxing on with @cambayly for sprint points at @BayCyclingClass. Great few days of racing to sharpen up for… https://t.co/TuvLEpRSaE
There's no better way to start the year than with my favourite kind of day. Race Day. Day 1 @BayCyclingClass in Gee… https://t.co/eqdHnqk2EL
Landed yesterday, racing today. That's the @ATGCycling way. Two big months racing in Asia but nothing beats… https://t.co/ePcENcbtGW
Whoop whoop. @RebeccaWiasak wins the woman's grade in #Goulburngreatdivide @CyclingNSW road race. https://t.co/S2bnL25arT
1 lap to go @mobiusfutureRT duo @DyballB and @stannardrj have 2min on peloton. @CyclingNSW #Goulburngreatdivide https://t.co/MXs5s6EhH5
Woman's grade all together after lap 1 of 2 in @CyclingNSW #Goulburngreatdivide road race. https://t.co/kKvOUiZcea
Break of 9 has huge 1:30 gap of peloton #Goulburngreatdivide after lap 1 of 3. 2 @mobiusfutureRT, 2 @GPMNextByte,… https://t.co/c7nZ6XstUa
All grades away now for the @CyclingNSW #goulburngreatdivide road race. Go dad! https://t.co/nXmZBUGycU
Exciting news today from @whatstodaysplan who are partnering with @TeamSky. 👍 https://t.co/shkdeprXxx
Bit of spring cleaning. https://t.co/DklWdE5syU
Part 2 Romantic Holiday (#ToGSC) done. @RebeccaWiasak was super swannie! If only I had her on the bike we might have reached the top step.
Congratulations to @SammyCrome and @AvantiIsoWhey on the GC win at #ToGSC #NRS16. It was a good battle and I'm happy to walk away with 2nd.
Final stage of the #ToGSC with 11sec to find in a 30-lap criterium on Portland foreshore. #NRS16 https://t.co/cbo3f4h3Yp
So excited to be back racing @Subaru_NRS at #ToGSC16 - 8th in opening stage and now 4th GC with sprint time bonuses. https://t.co/pKGVQrAfgw
Beck is back so we decided to go on a romantic holiday starting with a weekend away at the Oatley Winery in Mudgee. https://t.co/9BvJQCYfLD
After 9 years of trying to win in Mudgee, I couldn't have done it any better way than to ride away with my bro! https://t.co/o6u1htgScL
After some rest I'm excited to start training again. Thankfully I've got @whatstodaysplan to help me build fitness. https://t.co/tN5LH2tOxj
Baltyk-Karkonosze tour stage 4. Another euro 5th place for me 😕 thanks @ATGCycling boys for the help.
Baltyk-Karkonosze Tour (2.2) in Poland stg 1. In break, won some sprints, attacked, caught 3km to go. Points leader. https://t.co/RZIpPN4htl
Had a real hard day at a Czech Republic (1.2) today in a windy, hilly circuit race but managed another top 5. 5th https://t.co/vvPXCqMFdZ
Circuito del Porto, Italy UCI 1.2 174km, 12x14.5km lap, flat, technical, wet. Italians gave us a lesson in bumping bars in the final. Bunch.
@nic_dougall @TeamDiData just like the good old days with Drayton.
Another UCI 1.2 today @ATGCycling boys rode awesome, we couldn't get any moves to stick. I managed to salvage 4th in small bunch sprint.
Did my first UCI race in Europe today, a 1.2 that went from Serbia to Bosnia. Got in the winning move but was not great in the final. 5th
After a long time traveling I've made it to Slovenia with the @ATGCycling boys, getting ready for some euro racing! https://t.co/IXUrS1ccmY
We did it! Won my first UCI tour #tourofthailand. Thanks @ATGCycling, especially @cambayly who was incredible today! https://t.co/ZUA0qcs8YT
Sitting 4th GC @+9. The @ATGCycling boys are ready to fight for yellow in today's last stage of #tourofthailand https://t.co/4T2nWJjQqV
Helping my @ATGCycling team mates use @whatstodaysplan at the #Tourofthailand 📷 @aldermartz https://t.co/yKTtDpgZ3r
I'm super pumped to be heading over to Europe for a racing block with @ATGCycling next month. Can't wait to put my legs to the test.
Presentation at the Dean Carter Memorial in Griffith on Sunday. 📸 @TheAreaNews https://t.co/qT7yMQxaWq
Ben Hill goes it alone to win Griffith race https://t.co/KvaLDrXscf via @DailyAdvertiser
Canberra’s Ben Hill to headline race https://t.co/c5f2QTHWty via @DailyAdvertiser
.@ATGCycling team mate @aldermartz was not at the #OricaKermesse to defend his title so I had to win it for him. https://t.co/k5BQnpw61V
Super hard, super fun @CanberraCycling Crit tonight. Back-to-back wins to stretch the Hill brother streak to four. https://t.co/ZzfVwLFn1d
Feeling really good coming off the back of @HeraldSunTour and happy to take the win at the @CanberraCycling club crit champs tonight.
Thanks to @whatstodaysplan, a vital part of getting me race ready for @HeraldSunTour and on the podium! https://t.co/C2U8zsmu4p
Gave it everything to try and hold off bunch at final round of @SuperSeriesSA. Just hung on for 3rd @whatstodaysplan https://t.co/q9GRkQ64XU
Wrapped up overall win in three-race @NorwoodCycling Super Series last night with teamie @cambayly second overall. https://t.co/pmojh9Jn1s
Great to get my first win for @ATGCycling at the @NorwoodCycling Uraidla Kermesse. Huge thanks to teamie @cambayly. https://t.co/L3Nztofk4h
Pretty cool that @whatstodaysplan partnering with my team @ATGCycling. Proud ambassador for this Canberra company. https://t.co/N5AiDQ3rkW
New year, new team. Have signed with UCI Continental Team @ATGCycling based in Asia for 2016. Looking forward to new opportunities.
Great to have @TwoBeforeTen open on a public holiday so I could catch-up with my girlfriend. https://t.co/MNPWVgVZFs
Thanks @SWCyclingTeam for letting me ride at @SuperSeriesSA. Was a good team effort with three in top-5 @cambayly @tchapman432
Offie officially over. This bike riding business is hard work. Just napped for longer than my ride today.
Thanks to @CMRacingTeam for a fun and successful 2015. Wouldn't be where I am without the amazing team staff, sponsors and teammates.
Excited to share the news that I will be riding for new UCI Continental Team @DynamoProTeam in 2016 based on France. https://t.co/pW0lNkW3gF
Extremely proud of the @CMRacingTeam today. They rode their legs off to keep me in this race. #ToT15 📷 Con Chronis http://t.co/qzQQVZ33If
The @CMRacingTeam rode super strong today to defend the lead. Unfortunately I couldn't finish it off, 4th. #ToT15 http://t.co/JRZgvJqD58
Love a short, hilly, technical, windy prologue. So happy to win and take the Tour lead for @CMRacingTeam at #ToT15 http://t.co/ss2j4JKvhC
Home in Canberra long enough to do a load of washing. On the road now with @CMRacingTeam for 3 weeks. First stop was @stkildacc Crits today.
For results, photos and updates from the Tour of Poyang Lake follow Ben Hill - Cyclist on Facebook. https://t.co/1Mx93QwJis
Doesn't get much better than this. Solo win at Goulburn Great Divide Road Race with @JoshTaylor1991 winning sprint. http://t.co/ngr1980kNv
Happy to finish third in the NSW TT Champs today among a pretty strong field. http://t.co/hq6RSZpsSi
Few battle wounds from road race, but keen to get back out there to keep fighting for a win at King Valley this week! http://t.co/Q3WDKVf2c6
Great to help @CMRacingTeam teammates achieve some top results at #ToGSC15 inc. 2nd GC, 1st young rider & 2nd Team. http://t.co/5ePwKkxvZG
@aldermartz @The_UDC_ @GPMStulz wasn't that the same bunch I rolled you by 3 bike lengths in the finishing sprint?
@The_UDC_ @GPMStulz @aldermartz if it's anything like Wednesday bunch we'll be lucky to see him at the start line.
Love racing Mudgee. One I've wanted to win since I started riding. Second in handicap today. Another chance tomorrow. http://t.co/iVpS9Or5L6
Back in Canberra after an awesome trip to America. Pumped to rejoin @CMRacingTeam for the second half of the #NRS15
Thanks to @sciconbags for making travel with a bike a breeze, and for keeping my @giantbikesaus Propel in one piece. http://t.co/1R5hVACfKM
My @giantbikesaus Propel has taken me to some amazing parts of America the past month. #ridelife #ridegiant http://t.co/3x7eOjl6T6
Change of scenery for final ride in USA, from Venice to Santa Monica. Will miss only having to wear knicks/jersey. http://t.co/NN12HKhsLP
Have mostly avoided the temptations in Vegas. Great to get out and explore Red Rock Canyon with @RebeccaWiasak http://t.co/HFih2HmWzZ
Found some mountains to ride through. Who knew Vegas had such cool training loops. Bike friendly too! http://t.co/styhAmfF00
Extended my trip to America to make the most of warm weather. Putting in the miles today on the California trails. http://t.co/DnKk40ffoc
That wraps up my USA campaign. Thanks @DonkeyLabel for the opportunity. Hope to spend a lot more time here next year! http://t.co/hbMp8zwtgx
Congrats to this donkey @Jakeymagee for top-10 in final stage @TOADCyclingRace. Epic few weeks racing with you. http://t.co/grHMm3eece
Awesome to take a solo win in final stage of @TOADCyclingRace. Fun week of racing, with two wins & two second places. http://t.co/CPILBX2PeI
Have loved guest riding for @DonkeyLabel. Thanks so much for the opportunity and amazing hospitality, especially from host family @jimmerc.
Gave it everything in final stage in a three-man break. Was second in a sprint finish. Three second places and three days in yellow at #NSGP
We fought hard but unable to hold onto leaders jersey. Thanks to my amazing @DonkeyLabel teammates for their support & congrats @OPTUMpbKBS.
There is live video coverage of today's pro race at 7:50PM CT on @velonews! Watch @DonkeyLabel try to defend yellow. http://t.co/j5ZhGryyCR
The @NSBikeFest have short video highlights from each stage of #NSGP including Stage 3 where we defended yellow. https://t.co/Yj6CZqlf1D
Took the yellow on Stage 2 #NSGP. It will be a big day today defending it - lucky donkeys are tough. 📷 @nateryanphoto http://t.co/dDKmklW9uO
Really happy to start my racing block in the USA on the podium. Second today in time trial at North Star GP. #NSGP http://t.co/tP58DLjgIF
Loving my new @diamantdmt shoes. Smoking in morning bunchies now. Am at least 20% faster! http://t.co/TbtW5SXjFL
Video highlights from my stage win at #BOTB15 in Murwillumbah. #NRS15 http://t.co/IMLO9rW0dG http://t.co/PYPfaTiOcb
Booked flights to USA on weekend. Bit of an impromptu trip but keen to keep this good form going. Fly out next week! http://t.co/2Rkf0jt7kC
This one felt so good! Thanks to our amazing @CMRacingTeam sponsors and staff for making it all possible. http://t.co/DhA7Jh9KzH
So happy to finish the first half of the Aussie season on the top step. Nice to add another win for @CMRacingTeam. http://t.co/hGPB6EtjQA
Great video from @WINNews_TWBA from final stage #tot15 where I secured the sprint jersey and @CMRacingTeam stage win! http://t.co/lQ7FzyRBpL
Cheeky 7th in TT earlier today thanks to super-fast @giantbikesaus + aero @lazerhelmets, @ReynoldsCycling wheels, @champsys speed suit.
Spent after 140km in a three, then two-man break in Stage 3. Collected KOM, Sprint & Most Aggressive Jerseys. #tot15 http://t.co/0bwS4dIEVo
All our dirty @champsys kit was no problem for @CoppKerri. Big thanks for spoiling us so much this last week. http://t.co/gFoAg1vwcX
Pumped for the start of the #touroftoowomba tomorrow! @CMRacingTeam is ready to go. @RenaultAU @BRIGHTONRENAULT http://t.co/L2qlT5eTRH
Almost tempted to apply for @CMRacingTeam director so I can drive this sick @RenaultAU all day. Sure does turn heads. http://t.co/X3qs1y7GEA
Thanks to @RenaultAU @BRIGHTONRENAULT we are cruising around the Gold Coast is style. http://t.co/OdJCtJJCgW
Cool snap with @CMRacingTeam teammate @Jakeymagee in @DailyAdvertiser at Tolland Open - @lazerhelmets looks slick. http://t.co/FPw8M8BbLf
Solid day at the Cootmundra Haycarters Handicap. Didn't quite catch limit but happy to take out fastest time. http://t.co/7K6RalBRlj
Keen to take these bad boys for a spin at #cootahaycarters this weekend. @giantbikesaus #gottalovecountryhandicaps http://t.co/PyZAZoz4dP
Thanks to @pioneercyclo for faultlessly capturing my data at Tolland Open - fastest time & a couple of cheeky KOMs https://t.co/TvKulz25V1
Love country handicaps. Fastest time at Tolland Open today after 2nd across line yesterday. Great weekend of racing. http://t.co/NcFvJrvdoe
Nice to be rewarded with the Most Aggressive jersey + Sprint jersey after a hard day in the break at @adelaidetour http://t.co/aAYCmg4Nhe
Gave it everything in the break with @Raph_the_Kaiser for @CMRacingTeam in Stage 4 Kermesse. Caught with a lap to go. http://t.co/AI5mVyuRzA
